MAN.TITLE: dos

DESCRIPTION.P: Sends a string command-name to Windows for execution by the cmd shell. Standard output and standard errors of the shell command are written in the calling shell. bOK returns if command has been executed.
[output,bOK] = dos(command-name,'-echo') forces the output to the Command Window, even though it is also being assigned into a variable.
To open the notepad editor and return control immediately to Scilab dos('start notepad')
